pkgmetadata.longdescription: Boltzmann Machines with MM Algorithms // Provides probability computation, data generation, and model estimation for fully- visible Boltzmann machines. It follows the methods described in Nguyen and Wood (2016a) doi:10.1162/NECO_a_00813 and Nguyen and Wood (2016b) doi:10.1109/TNNLS.2015.2425898.
